message:
SYSTEM: ISSGC08.pdf: Página 25
©<Miembro Grupo>
26
Distributed Data Mining
• Large amounts of distributed data
• It is possible to extract useful information from the data 
generated
• Possibility of distributing data mining processes
– Adaptation of data mining processes to a distributed environment
• ADMIRE
– Advanced Data Mining and Integration research for Europe
– Accelerate access to and increase the benefits from data exploitation;
– Deliver consistent and easy to use technology for extracting 
information and knowledge;
– Cope with complexity, distribution, change and heterogeneity of 
services, data, and processes, through abstract view of data mining and 
integration; and
– Provide power to users and developers of data mining and integration 
processes.
speaker: SYSTEM
